settings.text:
Express Shipping - We currently offer Express Post Australia-wide, shipping prices are determined by distance and weight. Australia Post recommends allowing 1-2 business days however please be advised that this service may be slightly delayed. 

Standard Shipping - Free on all orders over $150. We offer Parcel Post Australia-wide, shipping prices are determined by distance and weight. Australia Post usually recommends allowing 2 - 6 business days however please be advised that this service may be slightly delayed. 

Express and standard shipping both have the choice of transit cover and signature on delivery at the buyer's choice. Duywellery does not take ownership of any lost or stolen parcels however will offer assistance where possible to track the parcel. 

 

Free Store Pickup - For our local customers we are happy to offer free store pickup. Please allow us 24 hours to get your order ready for collection. 

 

International Shipping - We currently offer international shipping to the following countries.

US & Canada - Includes tracking. Australia Post estimates 5 - 7 business days to the USA and 9 - 11 business days to Canada. Occasionally parcels will take longer however this is out of our control and dependent on Australia Post. Please be advised that this service may be slightly delayed. 

New Zealand - Includes tracking. Australia Post estimates 5 business days. Occasionally parcels will take longer however this is out of our control and dependent on Australia Post. Please be advised that this service may be slightly delayed.

 

Jewellery Cleaner - Please note that Jewellery Cleaner must be sent via road (Parcel Post) and therefore cannot be sent via express post or international shipping. This means that it can take anywhere from 7-10 business days to arrive. 

 

If you have any questions regarding the shipping of your order, please don't hesitate to contact us on (09) 1234 5678 or via email at service@duywellery.com
